_attributes.value: Gathers energy in the relic through combat. The use of a Cardinal Force skill will cause the relic's emblem to shift, and a successful hit will add to the gauge.\nUsing #cAncient Force# skills will consume the built-up gauge. After using a Cardinal Force skill, you can chain other Cardinal Force or #cAncient Force# skills together, allowing them to be used more quickly.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
#c[Cardinal Force]#
An archery technique used to achieve high mobility. Release Swiftstrike Energy stored in your weapon as a short burst of speed that propels you to your destination, then swing your weapon to attack nearby enemies.
You can use the directional keys to move left, right, or up with this skill. If used without directional input, you will swing your weapon at your current location.
#cLevel 20 required to learn Advanced Cardinal Force#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Consumes 1 Swiftstrike Charge\nDeals #v% damage #w times to up to #u nearby enemies.\nYou gain 1 Swiftstrike Charge every #s2 sec, and can store up to a maximum of #y.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: #c[Ancient Force]#\nLeap up and fire 3 explosive arrows downward. These arrows will explode when they come in contact with an enemy, or when they reach their maximum range.\nIf you are already airborne, the arrows will be fired immediately without the leap.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Relic Gauge Cost: #forceCon. Explosions deal #u% damage #w times to up to #v enemies.\nCooldown #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Calls forth a dark-elemental Raven for a period of time. The summoned Raven can attack up to 4 enemies at once.\nThe Raven's attacks cannot be reflected by attack reflection skills. In addition, permanently increases your Defense.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, summon a Raven for #time sec. Deals #damage% damage to up to 4 enemies at once.\n[Passive Effect: Increases your Defense by #pddR%]

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Your growing resilience to the curse grants you the ability to resist abnormal status ailments for a set amount of time.\nAny status ailment received while this buff is active will further increase your status resistance. Permanently increases both your status resistance and all elemental resistances.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, increases Status Resistance by #s for #time sec. If afflicted by an abnormal status while this skill, Status Resistance will be increased by #x, and can be stacked up to #y times.\n[Passive Effect: Increases Status Resistance by #asrR and all Elemental Resistances by #terR%]

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: When the Relic Gauge has increased by a certain amount, the relic emits a powerful energy that enhances the Pathfinder's combat capabilities.\nThe relic's activation status is displayed around the gauge. If the gauge is full, the activation level will not increase

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Each time the Relic Gauge has been filled up by #x, your Final Damage is increased by #indiePMdR% for #time sec.\nRestores HP/MP by #y% when activated\n[Passive Effect: Increases Max HP by #mhpR%]

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Manifests the power stored within the relic to call forth magical arrows that chase and attack enemies in range.\nThese magical arrows are not affected by attack reflection skills.\nRequired skill: #cCardinal Burst Amplification Lv. 5 or above#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: When using Cardinal Deluge while the relic displays the Burst emblem, there is a #prop% chance to create #bulletCount magical arrows.\nThese magical arrows will chase nearby enemies for #time sec and explode on contact, dealing #damage% damage to up to #mobCount enemies #attackCount times.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Chance to dodge enemy attacks. When you succeed, attacks you land in the next second will result in Critical Hits.

_attributes.name: h

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Increase your combat ability by further perfecting your archery fundamentals.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: With the relic finally made whole, its flow of energy has become more stable and potent, allowing you to enhance #cEnchant Force# skills with the power of the Cardinal Force.\nThe currently-displayed emblem determines the characteristics of #cEnchant Force# skills, and will be reset after an #cEnchant Force# skill is used.\nAfter using a Cardinal Force skill, you can chain #cEnchant Force# skills to use them in quick succession.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: The Relic Gauge is charged by #y when attacking an enemy with a Cardinal Force skill, and by #x per hit from Cardinal Deluge's guided arrows.\nThe Shadow Raven will charge the Relic Gauge by #s for each enemy hit by its attacks. When you use another Cardinal Force skill, all Ancient Force and Enchant Force skills will have their cooldowns reduced by #w sec, except for 5th Job Advancement skills.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Overcoming the Ancient Curse allows you to turn its debilitating effects on your foes in battle.\nBow skills and special attacks will inflict the curse on enemies, and the Shadow Raven will focus its attention on enemies with the curse when summoned.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Using certain skills will inflict enemies with the Ancient Curse debuff, which lasts for #time sec and can be stacked up to #x times.\nSkills that utilize the Ancient Bow deal an increased #y% Critical Damage to enemies for each stack of the curse debuff currently afflicting them.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Enhances all Cardinal Force skills with the power of the restored Relic.

_attributes.value:

Attack nearby enemies with your bow, then let loose a magical arrow to attack enemies in a wider range.
#cDeluge Enhancement#
Increases the magical arrow's effective range.
#cBurst Enhancement#
The bow attack will deal a powerful strike to a single enemy.
#cTorrent Enhancement#

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Allows you to manage skills stolen from other Explorer characters. Use this skill to forget stolen skills or call them up with Impeccable Memory. Skills may be assigned to an Impeccable Memory slot of the same rank or higher. Skills cannot be used immediately after being assigned.

_attributes.value: Manage stolen skills. 30 second cooldown added.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
While this skill is active, using Combat Teleport will create a streak of black lightning between your starting and ending positions, injuring enemies and marking them with a Dark Brand. Attacking enemies marked by Dark Brands will consume the Brand and inflict additional damage.
Learning Dark Shock causes Dark Chain and Battle Burst to inflict Dark Brands, although Dark Brands cannot be consumed by those skills or minions. Also, using Hasty Aura will increase the movement range of Combat Teleport. (To toggle that function, right-click Hasty Aura on the skill UI.)
Required Skill: #cCombat Teleport Lv.5+#
#cLevel 20 required to learn Abyssal Lightning.#
Can be toggled #cOn/Off#.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Unleashes a powerful straight punch in front of you with the explosive power of the Arm Cannon. You can use Revolving Cannon while using this skill. You can also link this skill to Double Blast and Bullet Blast.\n#cLevel 20 required to learn Bobbing.#

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Use your Arm Cannon to create additional explosions and deal damage. This cannot be used as a standalone skill, and can only be used during certain attacks. Holding the key down to charge will manually reload your Ammo. You can charge while using other skills, and can charge up to 2 skills simultaneously.\n#cSkills usable during Revolving Cannon: Magnum Punch, Double Blast, Revolving Blast#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Uses 1 Ammo, and your Ammo is reloaded if used as a key-down skill

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Depletes the Dynamo Gauge to release massive explosions and shockwaves. Ignores Defense Rate of enemies' in melee range.
The Dynamo Gauge charges when using Revolving Cannon during certain offensive skills. Additional shockwaves are released based on Dynamo Gauge bars used, dealing extra damage based on proximity. Immune to damage from attack reflection.
Required skill: #cRevolving Cannon Mastery Lv.5#
#cLv. 10 required to learn 'Revolving Blast'.#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Requires #x or more Dynamo Gauge bars. Attack up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% damage #attackCount times. Melee hits ignore #ignoreMobpdpR% of enemy Defense Rate.\nReleases Shockwave 1, attacking up to #q enemies for #w% damage #w2 times.\n#cAfter use, you will Overheat for #time sec. While Overheated, the Dynamo Gauge is set to max, and you cannot charge the Dynamo Gauge or use Bunker Buster Explosion.# On ending, depletes the Dynamo Gauge.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, allows you to jump a greater distance

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Fire your cannon to thrust in the direction opposite the way you are facing. The recoil that thrusts you will also damage nearby enemies. Using the skill while holding the up arrow key will cause an explosion on the ground that propels you upward. Attacking an enemy with attack reflection will not damage you, and the skill cannot be used while reloading.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: When attacked by an enemy, generates a protective shield proportional to the damage taken. The total of the shield and current HP can't exceed the max HP or the shield will disappear. While using Blaster skills, you cannot be knocked back.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: When hit, converts #x% of your damage taken into a protective shield. #y% + #z of the shield dissipates every 5 second. The maximum strength of the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nKnockback Resistance increases by 100% while using Blaster skills.\nPermanently increases Knockback Resistance by #stanceProp%, DEF by #pddX, and Max HP by #mhpR%.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Study the Arm Cannon to learn the basics of Revolving Cannon. Any enemies attacked directly by an overheated Arm Cannon will receive additional damage due to the excess heat, and the additional damage increases depending on your number of charged Dynamo Gauge stock.\n#cAffected skills: Magnum Punch, Double Blast, Hammer Smash, Shotgun Punch, Ballistic Hurricane, Muzzle Flash, Hyper Magnum Punch, Gatling Punch, Bullet Blast#\n#cLv. 5 required to learn the 2nd Job skill 'Revolving Cannon Upgrade'.#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: #c[Final Attack Type Skill]# When the Dynamo Gauge has at least 1 stock, direct attacks from the Arm Cannon will trigger additional attacks which deal #damage% #attackCount times. For each charged Dynamo Gauge stock, the damage of the additional hits increase by #x%.\nPermanently increases Movement Speed by #psdSpeed, Jump Power by #psdJump, and Max Movement Speed by #speedMax.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Performs a powerful 2-hit combo in the direction you're facing using the momentum from your Arm Cannon. After you learn this skill, you can also activate it by repeatedly pressing the Magnum Punch button. You can use Revolving Cannon while using this skill. Can be linked to Bobbing, Weaving, Hammer Smash, Shotgun Punch, or Bullet Blast.

_attributes.name: h

Required skill:#cMagnum Punch Lv. 20#
#cLevel 15 required to learn Weaving.#

_attributes.value:

Charge the skill by holding down the key. #cWhile charging, attacks won't knock you back. Releasing the charge will cancel any of your active skills, and will create an extra shockwave that deals additional attacks.#
You can charge skills even while other skills, aside from Hammer Smash, are in use, and up to 2 skills may be charged at once.
You will not take damage from shockwaves that strike enemies with attack reflection.
Also permanently increases Double Blast damage.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Reloads Ammo. Rush, grab and stun an enemy you're facing. Prioritizes highest Max HP target in range. Revolving Cannon is usable while holding enemy. Use Revolving Cannon on the enemy 6 times and perform this skill again to unleash a Bunker Buster for extra damage. Activates even when grabbing an enemy that can't be stunned. Invincible while holding the enemy. Bonus Bunker Buster attack ignores additional Defense Rate. Will not activate if no enemies are nearby. \nAffected enemy is immune to Stun for 90 seconds.\nRequired skill: #cBunker Buster Explosion Lv. 10#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Rushes and grabs enemies for #damage% damage. Stuns. Hits #attackCount times. Activate Revolving Cannon to attack up to #s more enemies up to 6 times. Each attack hits #s2 time(s) for #x%, #y%, #t%, #w2%, #q%, or #q2% damage.\nBonus Bunker Buster deals #z% damage #v times and ignores additional #ignoreMobpdpR% Defense Rate.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Converts an active Blast Shield to HP. You can't use this if no Blast Shield is active or if your HP is full. There is a brief moment after using this skill where damage from attacks, including attacks that deal a percentage of your HP, is reduced. The damage reduction is determined by the damage reduction of Charge Mastery. This buff is not affected by buff duration extension effects. Additionally, permanently increases Magnum Launch damage.\nRequired skill : #cShield Training II Lv. 20#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, recovers HP equal to the sum of the dissipated Blast Shield and #x% of your Max HP. The extended defense period lasts for #time sec.\nMagnum Launch damage increased by #damPlus% points.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Temporarily increases the stats of all party members. Does not stack with Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, Hero of the Flora, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, or Rhinne's Protection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Increases all stats assigned APs by #x% for #time sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Hones your resolve to ignore certain abnormal status effects. Immune to Abnormal Status for 3 sec after use.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: The final upgrade for the Revolving Cannon embedded within your Arm Cannon. This overwrites the increases from Revolving Cannon Plus II.\nRequired skill: #cRevolving Cannon Plus II Lv. 20#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
Bunker Buster Explosion damage +#w% points, Shockwave 1 damage +#w2% points, Shockwave 2 damage +#u% points, and Shockwave 3 damage +#u2% points
Additional attack damage due to overheating +#s% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Magnum Punch +#s2% points, Revolving Cannon damage during Double Blast +#v% points
Maximum Dynamo Gauge capacity expanded to 6 slots, maximum number of Bullets increased to 6.
Using Bunker Buster Explosion while the Dynamo Gauge is at 6 slots or higher increases its damage by 150% points and will generate Shockwave 4, which attacks up to #dot enemies for #q% damage #q2 times.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Enhances the Blast Shield through rigorous mental training and perseverance. Additionally, permanently increases Rocket Rush damage.\nRequired Skill: #cShield Training Lv. 20#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: When hit, convert #x% of damage taken into a protective shield. #y% + #z of the shield dissipates each second. The maximum potential for the shield is equal to your Max HP.\nPermanently increases Abnormal Status Resistance by #asrR% and Elemental Resistance by #terR%.\nRocket Rush damage +#damPlus% points.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Increases the Mastery, Critical Damage, and Boss Damage of the Arm Cannon.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Maintain control over your power to optimize charge skills. Overwrites the buffs from Charge Mastery. Additionally, permanently ignores a portion of enemies' Defense Rate when attacking, and decreases damage taken.\nRequired skill: #cCharge Mastery# Lv. 14

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: Decreases the charge time for all charge skills by #x%. Using a charge skill reloads #w Ammo immediately but will not reload while in midair or interrupt an auto-reload.\nImmediately after using charged Bobbing, Weaving, or Hammer Smash, all damage taken is briefly reduced by #y%, including attacks that deal damage based on your Max HP.\nPermanently ignore #ignoreMobpdpR% of enemies' Defense, and damage taken is reduced by #damAbsorbShieldR%.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Research the most efficient movement and attack patterns for battle. Using linked skills or charge skills will increase your abilities. This overwritesyour  enhancements from Combo Training. Attack Power is further increased.\nRequired skill: #cCombo Training Lv. 9'.#

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Rush forward with a powerful punch to cause a colossal explosion. 
Hold down the skill key to charge. This skill generates additional shockwaves based on charge time, dealing more damage to nearby enemies. While charging, you will have improved defense, increased Abnormal Status resistance, and can't be pushed back by attacks. 
Additionally, being attacked while charging will improve your final damage output. 
Hyper Magnum Punch's charge time is unaffected by Charge Mastery's charge time reduction effect. 
Shotgun Punch deals +30% damage to normal monsters once you learn Hyper Magnum Punch.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value:
MP Cost: #mpCon, Attacks up to #mobCount enemies for #damage% #attackCount times.
Generates a shockwave that attacks for #v% damage #v2 times.
Can be enhanced up to #z levels by charging, and each level of enhancement generates an additional shockwave that deals #q%, #q2%, #s2% damage #dot times.
While charging, the defense boosts from Charge Mastery are applied, and Abnormal Status Resistance increases by 100.
Each time you get hit while charging, the final damage increases by #x%, up to #y%.
Can be charged for up to #subTime sec.
Cooldown: #cooltime sec.
Shotgun Punch deals +#nbdR% damage to normal monsters once Hyper Magnum Punch is obtained.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Fills up the Morph Gauge and transforms you into your Final Form immediately upon use.
Morph Gauge is recovered as much as the amount that was in possession before the transformation when Final Form through Final Trance ends.
If transformed into Final Form using Final Trance, the skill duration is not affected by skill duration buffs.
Required skill: #cFinal Form Lv. 10#

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Transforms into Final Form for #time sec.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Grants you the courage and will of the former Kaiser, resetting your cooldowns, increasing Attack Speed and ATT, and negating enemy Attack Ignore and Attack Reflect effects.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Cooldowns Reset, Duration: #time sec, ATT +#indiePad, Attack Speed +1. Negates enemy's Attack Ignore and Attack Reflect effects\n#cCooldown: #cooltime sec. Hyper Skill cooldowns not reset.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Use your chain to grapple to a platform or enemy. Press the skill key to launch the chain horizontally or at a vertical angle.
Striking horizontally only targets monsters, while striking vertically only targets platforms within a certain distance. While airborne, you can strike downward to temporarily slow your descent.
If the#c Skill key is pressed again# while the chain is tethered, you will quickly move to the target location. When the chain is tethered and while moving with the skill, you become temporarily #cstealthed# where you cannot be hit, and attacking or using skills will deactivate the stealth.
Enemies struck by the skill are briefly #cslowed#. #cCan be used while using your other skills.#
#c[Up + Skill key]# Launches 45 deg. upward
#c[Down + Skill key]# Launches 45 deg. downward

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Max Enemies Hit: #q, Damage: #q2%, Number of Attacks: #u, #s% chance to slow enemies for #s2 sec, enables Dark Sight state and cannot be hit from the time you start moving for #u2 sec.\n#cCooldown: #cooltimeMS sec#

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Press the#c Attack Key# to whip your chain forward, then bring it crashing down. Enemies hit by the 2nd strike are pushed back. Foes struck by the chain are#c slowed# for a short time.
Other attacks can be used between the 1st and 2nd strikes to inflict enhanced damage.
#cCan be used while using your other skills.#
#cSkill Lv. 10 required to learn Chain Arts: Thrash II.#

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Extensive training with a varied assortment of weapons increases the damage of#c all of your attacks#. Whenever you#c switch summoned weapons#, you execute a bonus attack and receive the Muscle Memory buff. The additional attack is unaffected by attack reflection.
This buff stacks up to the#c number of summonable weapons# you possess (excluding Chain Arts). Summoning any weapon besides the last one used will refresh this buff. 
Muscle Memory is not affected by effects that increase buff duration.
#cLv. 10 required to learn Muscle Memory III.#

_attributes.value: Nya, nya, gettin' all the goods! Grants you bonus EXP and reduces nearby monster Defense. Unaffected by buff duration increase.

_attributes.value: This meat sure is easy on the stomach! Grants more EXP and gradually recovers HP. Unaffected by buff duration increase.

_attributes.value: Feelin' fresh after that power nap! Grants more EXP and increases ATT. Unaffected by buff duration increase.

_attributes.value: Pink Bean loves zooming around on a pink scooter made just for him! And don't worry! It's not a battle scooter or anything, so it won't even sting if he hits you with it.\nCannot be copied by Pink Shadow.

_attributes.value: Pink Bean loves growing monstrous plants, and this is a perfect spot for one! The plant's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Pink Bean cheers up the whole party with a special brand of adorableness! Boosts Party EXP, Speed, Attack Power, and Magic Attack Power. Unaffected by buff duration increase.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Pink Bean is one of the finest yo-yo-ers of this generation! Watch this burning trick that clobbers enemies multiple times. Unaffected by attack reflection.

You can get up to #x yo-yo(s) every #s sec, and they are used when you use the skill.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: With each attack, Pink Bean's fan club members, the Mini Beans, come out and attack alongside Pink Bean. What great groupies!

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Pink Bean took a shine to some goddess and imitated her to temporarily increase the stats of all party members.\nIt stacks with Maple Warrior, Call of Cygnus, Nova Warrior, Hero of the Flora, President's Orders, Anima Warrior, and Rhinne's Protection because imitation doesn't make one a goddess.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, won't bump into monsters after use, cannot be cast while hanging onto a rope or ladder.\nIncreases all stats assigned APs by 1% for every #y level for #time sec.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value:
Pink Bean has grown interested in Shade's Soul Splitter, and can use it to divide one nearby enemy's soul.
The split soul explodes after 5 sec, and deals damage to nearby enemies.
Cannot be copied by Pink Shadow.
#Souls will not be split for bosses and stationary monsters.
What pink friend should he create this time?

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, Split Souls from Pink Splitter explode after 5 sec, deal #x% + #y% per level damage 5 times up to 15 enemies, and award 100% bonus EXP from eliminated enemies during this time.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Pink Bean's love for all things pink can be... dangerous. This knocks over a pink pillar to deal heavy damage. During cooldown, there's a chance for Mini Beans to come to your aid, and every time they attack it lowers the cooldown on this skill. Unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h

Chance to summon Mini Beans during cooldown: +#y%
Each time Mini Beans attack, cooldown decreases by #x sec
Cooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Pink Bean loooves making shadow pictures, and summons a pink shadow which copies its actions after a short delay. It won't copy certain movement skills, and while it will act out summoning and buff skills, they'll have no additional effect.\nPink Bean sometimes will sometimes look back, notice the shadow, and wonder whether shadows can do that.\n* The shadow's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: h
_attributes.value: MP Cost: #mpCon, summons a shadow that makes an additional hit that is #x% of the final damage for #time sec, can summon up to 3 shadows, cannot be cast while hanging onto a rope or ladder.\nCooldown: #cooltime sec

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Pink Bean looooooves making shadow pictures, and summons a pink shadow which copies its actions after a short delay. It doesn't copy some movement skills, and copies summoning and buff skills but they have no effect.\nPink Bean sometimes looks back and sees the shadow acting after some delay. Wait, can a shadow do that?\nThe shadow's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Pink Bean loooves making shadow pictures, and summons a pink shadow which copies its actions after a short delay. It won't copy certain movement skills, and while it will act out summoning and buff skills, they'll have no additional effect.\nPink Bean sometimes will sometimes look back, notice the shadow, and wonder whether shadows can do that.\n* The shadow's attack is unaffected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Pink Bean is interested in moving through portals and keeps on opening new ones to random places. Sometimes someone familiar comes out of those portals.\nThere are still many devoted to following Pink Bean. Still as popular as ever.\nGo, Pink Beans! is not affected by attack reflection.

_attributes.name: desc
_attributes.value: Open the gate to the abyss, attacking forward for a moment, then summon an Abyssal Guard for the final blow. Shifts to Specter State when the skill is used. This skill does not consume Spectra, but cannot be used while Spectra Fatigue is in effect. Not affected by cooldown reset.\nEndless Agony is unaffected by attack reflection. Abyssal Guard Attack does damage to enemies with attack ignore and attack reflection.\nThe final hit can chain into any other skill. Skills chained from the final hit will be performed in place, unless you use the arrow keys to direct their attacks, even if you've chained it with Endless Agony.
